Training

NAISS offers a wide range of courses, workshops and seminars that are free to all users. Training is provided by staff from NAISS branches across Sweden.

Training events open for registration

For more information and registration, please click the titles below to go to the hosting branch event pages. This list is updated weekly.

Video recordings of recent training events

We provide a separate web page with links to video recordings from recent NAISS training events.

Comments and Questions on the NAISS training program

The NAISS training team is best reached through the support form in SUPR.
